4.27.17  9:53 am   do you think the new video will come out this month?

      I don't want to miss it, so can you please say when you're really really close to getting it done?
4.27.17  9:49 am   Do you realistically think the video will be done before May 7? (just "yes" or "no", not "that would be nice" or "plausible")
4.27.17  9:49 am   Will there be more Instagram teases?
4.27.17  9:36 am   Do you answer every single question you're asked? If no, which kinds of questions do you ignore?
4.27.17  9:25 am   Are you in constant crisis mode these days or are you keeping it low and steady?
4.27.17  8:57 am   Is it true that if you do nothing you are doing something because you're just standing not Moving? Or are you not doing something
4.27.17  8:50 am   Does Japan reappear in your new video?
4.27.17  8:46 am   what is your biggest pet-peeve
4.27.17  8:05 am   Why can't donuts be square?
4.27.17  8:04 am   who aren't you?

4.27.17  6:48 am   what do you think about the conflicting perspectives of Art: innovation vs. purity? i.e. is the result of our collective output a) the infinite accumulation of our human experience->expression, layered through time, or b) the slow chiseling towards revealing the essence/True nature of Art?

      i'm guessing from your idea of 'everything is good+bad', your goal to allow revelations & reduce things to their simplest, and your tendency to defy neat categories that you think its both. i guess the real question is, whether the result of Art is 1. a) or 2. a) and b). but anyways the main reason i'm asking this is because i think b) is an especially interesting idea, and one you seem to hint at, and i'm really interested in hearing what you think about it specifically !
4.27.17  6:23 am   How many Lowes could Rob Lowe rob if Rob Lowe could rob Lowes??
4.27.17  6:11 am   do things matter to you
4.27.17  3:50 am   why is the questions page a nice non-blinding dark color, but the the thank you page a blinding white?
4.27.17  3:39 am   how to type faster
4.27.17  3:36 am   Are there any questions annoying to you
4.27.17  3:32 am   what's something really NEAT that you discovered recently?
4.27.17  3:31 am   did y'all run out of crazy hints to drop?
4.27.17  2:30 am   will you answer this question with "oh hell yeah"?
4.27.17  2:20 am   where is your cat
4.27.17  1:59 am   If you got sick, how would you deal with that?

4.27.17  1:35 am   I feel like there is a very thin line between existential crisis that causes a huge increase in motivation and productivity, and existential crisis that just sends you straight down the I-don't-give-a-fuck-about-anything-hole where you are no longer interested in society and die afraid and alone in a swamp. How do I stay on the motivational side without being eaten alive by the sense that I am inherently making myself ignorant to the fact that nothing actually matters anyway.
4.27.17  1:32 am   also why are we doing anything at all?
4.27.17  1:31 am   don't you ever get tired of answering so so so so so many really similar questions all the time, like I think you must have amazing patience kinda, or youre just being reasonable
4.27.17  1:29 am   My mind is trapped in the mundane and in the search for quick, easy meaningless satisfaction, how do I get it out Bill?
4.27.17  12:41 am   How do I stop procrastinating? Its very hard for me to break this habit.
4.27.17  12:40 am   How do you think milk was discovered?
